sentences.sentence: Despite this drawback, millions of Daguerreotypes were produced.
sentences.translation: 尽管有此缺点，人们排出了数以百万的银版照片。

sentences.sentence: As the number of photographers increased, the cost of daguerreotypes fell.
sentences.translation: 随着摄影师越来越多，银版照相的费用也相应降低。

sentences.sentence: Antoine Claudet was one of the few people legally able to take daguerreotypes there.
sentences.translation: 在英国能合法使用达盖尔照相术人寥寥无几，安托万·克劳德特是其中之一。
